## ObjectEntry type

Type utility that represents an entry of an object as a tuple of key and value. Used by the [entries()](./type-object.entries.md) function to provide type-safe entry extraction.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ObjectEntry<T> = T extends NotIterable ? never : {
    [K in keyof T]: [K, T[K]];
}[keyof T];
```
**References:** [NotIterable](./type-object.notiterable.md)

## Example


```ts
type Entry = ObjectEntry<{ a: number; b: string }>; // ['a', number] | ['b', string]
```
